title: Didn't get lvl 6 token
body: So basically i was in a game of One For All and i got an S- with Miss Fortune and after the game it said I got the S- but i didn't really get the lvl 6 token, i've already got a lvl 6 token from a past game. Is it disabled or bugged?

replies.body:
Champion Mastery tokens are only available in normal or ranked matches on Summoner's Rift. Any rotating games modes, ARAM or Twisted Treeline are not eligible for mastery tokens, however, you can still earn Hextech chests and key fragments on those modes. For a complete rundown, check out our [Champion Mastery Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)

Let me know if you have any questions.
thanks alot!!! that really helped me understand this cuz i was wondering why i didn't get it in ARAM or the RGM's
You can only receive Mastery tokens in Normal and Ranked SR.
